definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="entity_has_achievement"><field name="achievement">CUSTOM:MarechiBlood</field><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="entity_send_chat"><value name="text"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">Marechi Blood Active</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="actbar"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">TRUE</field></block></value><next><block type="world_entity_inrange_foreach"><value name="_placeholder"><block type="entity_iterator" deletable="false" movable="false"></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value><value name="range"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">40</field></block></value><statement name="foreach"><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="entity_has_achievement"><field name="achievement">CUSTOM:ThrallDemon</field><value name="entity"><block type="entity_iterator"></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="entity_execute_command"><value name="command"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">/effect give @s scarletbonds:bloodlust</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_iterator"></block></value></block></statement></block></statement><next><block type="entity_execute_command"><value name="command"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">/effect give @s scarletbonds:bloodloss</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
